original_text: Jesus knew immediately that something powerful had gone out from him. So he turned around in the crowd and he asked, ‘Who touched my clothes?’
korean_text: 예수께서 그 능력이 자기에게서 나간 줄을 곧 스스로 아시고 무리 가운데서 돌이켜 말씀하시되 누가 내 옷에 손을 대었느냐 하시니

sentences.original_text: that something powerful had gone out from him
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 강력한 것이 자신에게서 나갔다는 것을

sentences.original_text: So he turned around in the crowd
